desc: Hello,Our application is a small RFQ management system. Please find below the process and requirements of the application:The mobile application shall be hybrid html5 and the solution shall be secured with three months supportSales Representative (Mobile App iOS/Android):1.	Logs in (login accounts are provided by admin)2.	Fill a basic form3.	Takes photos using their mobile or attach them4.	(Submit) Request QuotationSupervisor (Web /Same app Mobile iOS/Android):1.	Receives alert (push notification)2.	Prepares quotation type Labor price and parts description, quantity, prices manually - not from a list3.	System calculates commission based on a basic formula (tier based on total price and configured from admin)4.	Submit quotationSales Representative:1.	Receives alert (push notification)2.	Views quotation and commission3.	If approved by customer, type confirmation number, and confirmed amount and then submit4.	If not approved by customer, type choose cancelled and choose the reason for cancellation (from drop down list configured by the admin)Admin (Web /Same app Mobile iOS/Android):1.	On each Quotation, Can type Invoice Number and Invoiced amount (these info from another internal system, and will be typed manually no integration required)2.	 SubmitSales Representative:1.	Receives alert (push notification)2.	Views invoiced Quotations3.	Views commission (Only invoiced quotations confirmed)ScreensService advisor will view three pages:1.	Quotation request page (Edit)2.	Quotations history (View only) can be filtered3.	Commission History (View only)Supervisor will view two pages:1.	New RFQs - Quotation build up (Edit)2.	Quotations History (view only)Admin will view two pages:1.	Quotations pending for Invoice Numbers (Edit)2.	Quotations history (View only)3.	Delayed quotations alertsManagers Dashboard:1.	Quotations history (View only)2.	Invoiced Quotations history (View only)3.	Time of quotation request submission4.	Time of quotation submission5.	Conversion rate: Quotation to Confirmations6.	Conversion rate: Confirmations to invoices7.	Custom periodCustomer version (mobile ios/android):1.	No log in2.	Fill a form3.	Insert customer name4.	Insert customer email5.	Insert customer mobile number6.	Select shop – Drop menu7.	Take or attach photo8.	Submit request9.	The customer request goes to shop sales representativeRegards,Meshal Alharthi
title: RFQ Management system

desc: I need  an iPhone/iPad app.  I would like it designed and built.  Hello, I’m Lewis and I’m 25 years old.I have two ideas in mind.1: A dating app that involves both singles looking for love, but also one to be used as a quick hook up. So combining plenty of fish with tinder. With limit free features, and a premium membership fee. As well as genuine star system, like eBays. However it must be simple to use. Such as a swipe feature ( right for like, left for not interested ). Also if there is a match with the users they can arrange a date or meeting, through the app, using local services; hotels, cinemas, bars, clubs, restaurants, coffee shops and travel (public transport or Uber).2. The second idea is a app that is used for events, weekend breaks and quick getaways. To show the user. local or mainstream events; such as music or public interests, theme parks, zoos the like. The app must be simple to use and have star system for the best places by reviews of the users on the app. Plus the app can go to a direct link to that place of mind on their website. For instance Alton towers comes up then click on to it and go direct on to the site.

desc: Design is ready(psd and html)1)After installing the application customers can see the list of all Service providers.2)User can click on any service provider can check the details page of service provider which will include the Provider name, Address, Service and a calendar where all booked times will be marked in red.3)Calendar will be shown as date-hours(30 minutes interval)4)Customer can book an appointment, It will be automatically confirmed.5)Customer can cancel/Reschedule any appointment6)While booking any appointment the customer needs to provide with Name and email address7)Customer will get a notification if any SP will cancel the booking.1)For Service provider we have to implement the Registration(Email, Contact number and password) and Login, Otherwise which SP will access the app it can't be tracked, And accordingly the respective bookings wont be [url removed, login to view] OTP or any other verification wont be required.2)After login Sp will have 3 sections:A)Profile: Here Sp can add the service and address.B)Calendar: Here SP can update the busy hours in red.C)Appointments: Here SP can check the booking with Customer name, Email and Booking time.SP can cancel any appointment.D)SP will get the notification if any customer Schedule, Reschedule and Cancel any booking.

desc: As the title says, I am looking for people from the following 5 countries: USA, UK, Canada, South Korea, Thailand.Reason being as I need to test the latency/speed from these countries as we are launching our app in these 5 countries.First, I've created a step-by-step test guide for you and you'd follow the instructions based on my test guide and put a tick or cross if that feature/function is working or not. Feel free to give your feedback on what do you think of our app and how you think it can be improved. After this is done, we will be doing a p2p livestream so I can test the latency from my region to yours.You don't have to be a professional mobile app tester or technical person to apply for this job. Any layman person can do this as long as you follow my test guide and just give your feedback on what you think of my app and how we can improve it.If you're interested in this job, please post/pm me your rates and how long you can do this.I would also require your [Removed for encouraging offsite communication which is against our Terms and Conditions -Section 13:Communication With Other Users] to add you to our beta testers program.Thank you.Note: You need to own either an iPhone 6 and above or Android 4.4 and above.Please do NOT apply if you aren't from any of those 5 countries. You will be blocked and reported.

desc: I need a firebase chat app created in Android. For registration, you have to make use of the REST APIs we have already developed. There are 2 types of users - Professor and Students. Both users will have separate app i.e. Professor App and Student App1. Professor has to invite students (Name / phone no) to join his class2. Student has to accept the invitation to join the class3. Professor can have private chat with all the students in his class4. Student can also initiate private chat with professor5. Student cannot chat with other students6. Professor can boradcast a message to all the students in the class7. There can be multiple professors with their own classesI will provide the UI design as Adobe XD files.
title: Firebase Chat App in Android
